ygData.subject: Re: Skull topped staff
ygData.msgSnippet: Ummm... There are about 8 different staves like this... One of which the priest of discord uses. Yes, you CAN kill the priest of discord and take his, which is
ygData.messageBody:
Ummm... There are about 8 different staves like this... One of which the
priest of discord uses. Yes, you CAN kill the priest of discord and take
his, which is the only way to get one of these staves. Also, one of them is
a quest only staff.

>From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
>AARRRGGGHHH, (By the way, did you know that aarrrggghhh is an official
>Scrabble word)
>
>Not again. It's a rumor nothing more. The staff everyone is seeing is
>called the Staff of Writhing. It comes from a high level mob, and not the
>Priest of
>Dischord. Here are the stats
>
>1hb
>9Dmg
>33Delay
>Effect: Chaotic Feedback
>
>Thats all I could weasil out of the guy. He wouldn't give me the zone let
>alone the mob who carries it.
>Oh well I tried.
>
>Cheers,
>Malkin
>Wielder of the Worn Great Staff
>
>greenidminx@... wrote:
>
> > From: greenidminx@...
> >
> > I've heard a vague rumor that it's possible to find a skull somewhere to
>attach to the top of the runed totem staff, thus making it a
>different/better weapon.
> >
> > Is this possible? If so, where do you get the skull, and how is it
>attached to the staff?
> >
> > Thank you!
> >
> > Ximena, Wizard, Fennin Ro
> >
> >
>
>
